item.title: News
item.description: Please follow my Twitter if you would like to receive the latest updates about my research and open-source projects. Latest Preprints Neural Prompt Search Full-Spectrum Out-of-Distribution Detection Dynamic Instance Domain Adaptation Open-Vocabulary DETR with Conditional Matching Conditional Prompt Learning for Vision-Language Models Learning to Prompt for Vision-Language Models Please visit my Google Scholar page for an up-to-date list of papers.

item.title: Profile
item.description: Bio Dr. Kaiyang Zhou is currently a postdoctoral researcher at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, working with Prof. Ziwei Liu and Prof. Chen Change Loy. He obtained his PhD in Computer Science (2020) from the University of Surrey, UK, under the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. Prior to that, he received his MSc with Distinction (2016) from the University of Bristol, UK; BSc with 1st class honor (2015) from Ulster University, UK; BEng (2015) from Fujian Normal University, China.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Nanyang Technological University Lecturer / Guest Lecturer “Open-World Visual Recognition” for AI6126: Advanced Computer Vision “Object Detection” in the OpenMMLab Workshop Queen Mary University of London Teaching Assistant ECS797: Machine Learning for Visual Data Analytics ECS708: Machine Learning
